label: Rigo Voice Model
description: Model providing personalized fitness coaching advice.

safety_details.bias_risks: Potential misuse for impersonation or spreading misinformation.
safety_details.limitations: May not perfectly mimic nuances of speech; struggles with slang.
safety_details.out_of_scope_use: Unauthorized use for commercial purposes or defamation.
safety_details.recommendations: Implement user authentication and logging for accountability.

training_details.training_data: Audio samples from Rigoberto Uran's interviews and speeches.
training_details.preprocessing_steps: Audio clips normalized and annotated for phoneme alignment.

hyperparameters.training_regime: Used Tacotron 2 for speech synthesis with custom adjustments.

evaluation.testing_data: Tested with unseen text inputs and evaluated by native speakers.
evaluation.metrics: Assessed using Mean Opinion Score (MOS) and similarity ratings.
evaluation.results: Achieved an MOS of 4.3/5; high similarity in voice timbre.

technical_specifications.compute_infrastructure: Azure VM instances with GPU support
technical_specifications.hardware: 4 x RTX 3090 GPUs

label: Fitness Coaching Model
description: Model providing personalized fitness coaching advice.

safety_details.bias_risks: May unintentionally promote stereotypes in visual designs.
safety_details.limitations: Struggles with complex design elements and high-resolution outputs.
safety_details.out_of_scope_use: Should not be used for generating offensive or explicit content.
safety_details.recommendations: Review generated images for compliance with brand guidelines.

training_details.training_data: Trained on a dataset of Chivas product images and branding materials.
training_details.preprocessing_steps: Images were resized and normalized; branding elements were annotated.

hyperparameters.training_regime: Used a GAN architecture with specific loss functions for style consistency.

evaluation.testing_data: Tested on a separate set of brand images not seen during training.
evaluation.metrics: Evaluated using FID scores and human evaluator ratings.
evaluation.results: Achieved an FID score of 15.2; human evaluators rated outputs 4.5/5 on average.

technical_specifications.compute_infrastructure: AWS EC2 instances with GPU acceleration
technical_specifications.hardware: 8 x V100 GPUs with 16GB VRAM each

label: Voice Cloning for Personalized Ads
description: Creates personalized ads with Victor Amos voice, enhancing authenticity and brand connection.
prompt_template: Generate a personalized advertisement for Amotion using Victor Amos voice.

safety_details.bias_risks: Potential misuse for impersonation or spreading misinformation.
safety_details.limitations: May not perfectly mimic nuances of speech; struggles with slang.
safety_details.out_of_scope_use: Unauthorized use for commercial purposes or defamation.
safety_details.recommendations: Implement user authentication and logging for accountability.

training_details.training_data: Audio samples from Rigoberto Uran's interviews and speeches.
training_details.preprocessing_steps: Audio clips normalized and annotated for phoneme alignment.

hyperparameters.training_regime: Used Tacotron 2 for speech synthesis with custom adjustments.

evaluation.testing_data: Tested with unseen text inputs and evaluated by native speakers.
evaluation.metrics: Assessed using Mean Opinion Score (MOS) and similarity ratings.
evaluation.results: Achieved an MOS of 4.3/5; high similarity in voice timbre.

technical_specifications.compute_infrastructure: Azure VM instances with GPU support
technical_specifications.hardware: 4 x RTX 3090 GPUs
